And because up to US$300 million will be traded on the 2020 US Presidential market, you won't find a better source of truth.Bookmark this page NOW.

## Why Is It More Accurate Than Any Other Source?

The polls had Hillary winning by a landslide in 2016. They were[infamously wrong](https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2016/11/09/why-2016-election-polls-missed-their-mark/). And you can see why they always will be at the moment. If you’re a US voter, are you going to tell a stranger on the street who you’re voting for? You barely tell your family.

Similarly, do you know a news source that will predict,without bias, the 2020 US Election? Everyone has a team.

So we use weight of money and crowd wisdom. Hundreds of millions of dollars exchanged creates the most accurate intel you’ll find.

## But Americans Can’t Bet On It, Can They?

That’s true. If you live in the US, Presidential Betting is banned. However, expat Americans living all over the world do bet on it with Betfair (and their local bookies). There are a bunch of pro punters who bet on political markets too. We’ll leverage their independent predictions as the November election approaches.

## Who Is Bet Refinery?

We know how to identify the smart money and we create our own betting models. Which we’ll be sharing with you for FREE.

Whilst we won’t be creating data model predictions from the 2020 Election, we’ll have all your favourites sports. We’re winning punters and our tips are free. Join our mailing list for exclusive access as soon as our NFL, NBA, tennis, golf and other models are released.
